style: modern iOS app icon, soft and friendly aesthetic, pastel colors with gentle gradients, rounded shapes, professional healthcare vibe, clean minimal design, optimized for App Store
scene: a {main_object} representing baby care and health tracking, centered on a soft {surface_color} background with subtle depth and warm atmosphere

composition.layout: center-focused clean composition with breathing room
composition.depth_of_field: soft, focused on main object with gentle blur
composition.motion_feel: calm and stable, gentle curves for warmth
composition.icon_ready: suitable for iOS app icon with proper padding

elements.object_style: soft realistic, gentle curves, minimalist, pediatric healthcare themed
elements.surface_detail: smooth gradients, subtle shadows, professional medical feel
elements.shadow_type: soft ambient shadow, not too heavy
elements.lighting: natural daylight feel with warm ambient glow

colors.color_scheme: pastel and welcoming, not too bright or saturated

formatting.background: soft gradient from {top_color} to {bottom_color}, gentle and calming
formatting.corner_radius: will be applied by iOS, design with rounded corners in mind
formatting.output: no text, no logo, no UI elements, pure icon design

dashboard.main_object: baby footprint or baby bottle with heart

growth_tracking.main_object: growth chart line going up with baby silhouette

vaccination.main_object: medical shield with checkmark or syringe in friendly style

development.main_object: baby blocks spelling ABC or milestone markers

nearby_services.main_object: map pin with medical cross or stethoscope
nearby_services.description: icon for finding nearby pediatric services

activities.main_object: pacifier or baby rattle with stars

avoid: complex details that don't scale well
anything scary or intimidating for parents
prefer: clear silhouettes that work at small sizes
